title: ice: rustdoc: expect tcx.sess.has_errors return true

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust // Regression test for #75889. const FOO: dyn Fn() -> _ = ""; //~ ERROR E0121 static BOO: dyn Fn() -> _ = ""; //~ ERROR E0121 fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustdoc 1.67.0-nightly (5eef9b2c5 2022-11-10) binary: rustdoc commit-hash: unknown commit-date: unknown host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ``` ### Error output `rustdoc issue-75889.rs -Zunstable-options --document-private-items` ``` ```
Backtrace
